text:
Draga Olteanu Matei (née Olteanu) (; 24 October 1933 – 18 November 2020) was a Romanian actress. She starred in more than thirty movies from 1967 to 2006. She was born in Bucharest.
Her best known roles were in "A Bomb Was Stolen" (1961), "Haiducii" (1966), "Explosion" (1973), "Uncle Marin, the Billionaire" (1979) and in "The Famous Paparazzo" (1999).
Matei died at a hospital in Iași, Romania on 18 November 2020 from a gastrointestinal hemorrhage, aged 87.
